plot: Shows what can happen when a writer gets too close to their story. This romantic comedy begins with a wedding proposal that unfolds into a chaotic mix-up intertwining the perception between fantasy and reality.
title: Intervention
plot_es: Shows what can happen when a writer gets too close to their story. This romantic comedy begins with a wedding proposal that unfolds into a chaotic mix-up intertwining the perception between fantasy and reality.
